titleStmt.title: Letter from Jimmy (James Lloyd Jordan) to Eartha M. M. White. December 15, 1895.
titleStmt.author: Jimmy

publicationStmt.p: This document forms part of the project "Editing the Earth M.M. White Collection" at the University of North Florida.

msIdentifier.repository: University of North Florida, Thomas G. Carpenter Library Special Collections and Archives

msContents.summary: Author writes to his fiance White describing daily life and sharing greetings from his family.

objectDesc.p: A single page handwritten letter from Jimmy to White, written on 12/15/1895. Both sides of the paper contain writing and the letter is folded.

editorialDecl.p: This file was transcribed and encoded according to the editorial criteria of the project "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Collection." Using the various options encoded within <choice> elements, this file enables the viewing of a diplomatic transcription and a regularized reading text.

body.p:
I have realyreally
been looking for a
letter from you now
for some time. But
it seems like my
time now to ask
if you have ceased
corresponding. Though
can see knowno reason
why you should.
I really wrote you a
long letter before sending

you the pictures.
Sent them two
week later and since
that wrote you. But
up to now., I have
looked in vain for
a reply. It is that
I you have been
moveingmoving. But sure
you must be through
by now. I saw
your marma a few
days ago. She looks
very well I think.
And Eartha that last
photo taken in Buss
of your selfyourself I think
very good. And I
am going to look
for one. And that is

sure. Send me one,
will you?
How do you like
Brooklyn? Better than
New York. Remember
me to the ladies.
Say marma sends her
love to you. She speaks
of you being her
sweet little girl all the
time. I trust that
this will find you
well. I am not yet
entirely well. Though
lots better than I was
when I wrote you last.
And am looking better.
I should make an attempt
to go to work to morrowtomorrow
in mrMr. Richardson office.

My old employee faF.A.
dontdon't know how long
I will hold out. But
I hope all OK. I will
not go to running as DrDr.
Mitchel says there is
twotoo much dust for me.
We are having very
cool weather there
though very changeable.
Give my love to all.
The town is very
lively. And lots going
on. But I dont get out
to any thing., as I donâ€™t
go out at night, only
in the day. All churches
are preparing for xmasChristmas .
I trust you will have
a merry one. Write soon,
